memory layout for bad performance:<br>
00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000<br>
<br>
memory layout for good performance:<br>
00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000<br>
00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000<br>
00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000<br>
00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000<br>
